---------------------------------------------------------------------
ENTREGA 2 TAG 2.0
---------------------------------------------------------------------
NEW FEATURES

* Added JWT based authentication and authorization.
* Added service to retrieve current cryptocurrency quotations in USD and ARS.
* Added service to retrieve all the market orders.
* A user can now create a market order.
* A user can now apply to a market order.
* The transaction generated by applying to a market order can be cancelled by any participant involved in the transaction.
* A user can pay or confirm receipt of a transaction depending on the type of operation.
* Added service to inform the volume of assets operated by a user in a certain period of time.

OTHERS
* Updated GitHub Actions configurations for continuous integration.

NOTES

* Full testing of the model is still pending.
* More integration tests are still pending.
* Many refactors are still pending.
